title: Vengeance Recruitment LFP
body:
Hey guys, Vengeance White and Vengeance Black are both brand new teams Looking for players to help achieve the goal of becoming a Diamond or higher team, We would like you to have a working microphone and Skype with stable internet, In terms of SoloQ rankings being high platinum is very much preferred. All roles are required. If you're an ADC main and have a main duo for support that would be great due to you already having bot lane synergy. We will be doing trials for people looking to join. 

To try out or if you have any other questions add myself (Infuse) or post on this discussion.

replies.body: Hey I'm keen to try out. main top/jungle and decent at supporting.
Im Diamond 5 mid main however I have work on friday and on sat however if thats the only days that your holding then its all good
Hey I'd be keen to try out, Plat 5 top/jungle main

Trials are at. 6:00pm this friday (Brisbane time) and Saturday 4:30pm

If you would like to trial but these times are unsuitable for you add me let me know and we can work something out.

~Note

You do not have to attend both days, Just coming one is perfectly fine.
I'm a plat 2 jungle/top main and am keen to try out if possible :)
Im the Team Manager for Vengeance White any questions feel free to add either me (Shankopotami) or Infuse.
To everyone who has commented i have sent you a friend request and anyone else who has added me i have accepted and will look forward to talking to you later on.
Hi Challenger ADC main atm, would love to try out for this team in adc/support positions
Im her bitch :/ (the adc) also looking for a team sick of the yolo queue (diamond atm dropped from d3 last week, to d5 was d1 last season ending)
^ Confirming he's my ADC. :) We have great synergy.
Hi I am plat 2 and have been in numerous lan competition in NA. Now i've moved to oce I want to join another rank team. I am currrently plat 2 main mid and adc.
I would love to apply but I'm B5, however I've destroyed plats and golds in normals in the past week

I just want to say that i love you <3 
Plz let me join
